name: Hyper-realistic school student brain simulator
description:
Hyper-realistic School Student Brain Simulator 

This is a game built for byog 2020 around the theme 'Unlearn'. The objective is to simulate the brain of a school student, adding different subjects to his brain. These are then used to answer questions in school. Every time a subject is used the subject remains fresh in the students brain and is available the next day. Subjects that are not used through the day will be un-learned at the end of the day. 

The student gains xp for every question answered and loses xp for question ignored. As he levels up different scenarios will pop up in the form of text. The objective is to explore these different scenarios and find different endings.
